import { makeStyles } from "@mui/styles"; import footerAdornment from "../../assets/Footer Adornment.svg"; import Grid from "@mui/material/Grid"; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ footer: { backgroundColor: theme.palette.common.blue, width: "100%", zIndex: 1302, position: "relative", }, adornment: { width: "25em", verticalAlign: "bottom", [theme.breakpoints.down("md")]: { width: "21em" }, [theme.breakpoints.down("xs")]: { width: "15em" }, }, mainContainer: { position: "absolute", }, link: { color: "white", fontSize: "0.75rem", fontFamily: "Arial", fontWeight: "bold", }, gridItem: {}, })); const Footer = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return (
{/* Home */} Home {/* services */} Services Custom software development ios/ Android App development Website Development {/* Revolortion*/} The Recolotion Vision Technology Process {/* About As */} About As History Team {/Contact Us/} setValue(4)} to="/contact" className={classes.link}> Contact Us
); }; export default Footer;
